title: The Great Shift to Self-Custody: 800,000 BTC Worth Over $20 Billion Pulled From Exchanges in 3 Years
description: Over the past three years, there’s been a notable movement in bitcoin holdings. Since September 1, 2020, a whopping 804,000 bitcoin, equivalent to $20.79 billion, has been pulled from centralized exchanges. Notably, 184,000 BTC of that sum, valued at $4.75 billion, was withdrawn in just the last three months. Billions in Bitcoin Withdrawn from Centralized […]

title: TUC Taskforce Aims to Safeguard Workers’ Rights Amid AI Concerns
description: A task force led by the Trades Union Congress (TUC) is set to address the growing concerns surrounding the impact of artificial intelligence (AI) on workers’ rights. Tech expert Gina Neff from the University of Cambridge, alongside employment barrister Dee Masters and TUC campaigner Mary Towers, are collaborating to formulate new legislation that safeguards workers ... title: Turkey’s crypto adoption soars: 12% increase in investors over 18 months
description: Turkey witnessed a 12% surge in cryptocurrency investors over the past 18 months, according to a recent report by KuCoin. This uptick in crypto adoption comes amid economic uncertainties and a tech-savvy population increasingly turning to digital assets. KuCoin’s report sheds light on Turkey’s growing crypto market KuCoin, a global cryptocurrency exchange, released a comprehensive ... Read more

title: Ripple News: 1,987 XRP Millionaires Hold More Than 42 Billion – Is This a Healthy Ecosystem? Report
description: A small group of 1,987 addresses holds a jaw-dropping 42.73 billion XRP, contributing to over 80 percent of the currency’s total circulating supply. title: My Neighbor Alice (ALICE) Price Prediction for August: Should You Buy ALICE in 2023?
